title: Stubbies wearing teenager with mullet slides down dune at Crescent Bay, Port Arthur, in Tasmania
text:
A teenager with an incredible mullet successfully boogie boarded down a sand dune and landed with a splash into the water.

James Copping was at Crescent Bay, Port Arthur in Tasmania, on Sunday enjoying a sunny filled day at the beach.

Dressed in just his swimming shorts and holding onto his boogie board, the 19-year-old made his way to the top of the dune.

He looked at his friend and smiled as he whipped his mullet back and forth before leaping forward onto his boogie board onto the sand and slide down

He looked at his friend and smiled as he whipped his mullet back and forth before leaping forward onto his boogie board onto the sand to slide down.

The teenager spectacularly made his way down down the dune and 'caught a bit of air' before landing in the water.

The clip was uploaded to Facebook and has already been viewed more than 1.4million times.

The teenager spectacularly made his way down successfully down the dune and 'caught a bit of air' before landing in the water

Social media users commented on the video saying how it reminded them of their childhood and how they have to do it in summer.

'That takes me back to my childhood,' one person wrote.

'That looks bada**!!' another commented.

'I miss this fun time at the beach,' another wrote.
description: James Copping, 19, was at Crescent Bay, Port Arthur in Tasmania, on Sunday enjoying a sunny filled day at the beach when he decided to boogie board down the sand dune.
authors: Sahar Mourad For Daily Mail Australia
